name: Backyard Brawl
description: Welcome to Backyard Brawl! A third person laser tag game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Storage: 5.7 GB available space Sound Card: None
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Anything from 2018 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Anything from 2018 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Built-in.
